DeathSteel:

He lookes at Kaiser and grins slightly.  He can smell a test of metal 
a mile away. He stood up and nodded to Tyrael.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        He smirks inwardly at this new warrior.  Yes, adequate suits 
him. But 
> he likes it not.  Methinks, perhaps, he needs a lesson.  He grins 
again and 
> looks over to Major Tyrael.  "He seems dissatisfied with my 
compliment, 
> Major."  He gestures at Deathsteel with one hand.  "May I?"
